greetings: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What do you need help with?
Welcome! How can I help you?
farewells: Thank you for reaching out! Have a great day!
Goodbye! If you have more questions, feel free to ask.
product_inquiries: Can you tell me more about our products?
What are the latest deals on our products?
How can I find a specific product?
order_status: You can check your order status by providing your order number.
Please give me your order number to track your order.
I can help you with your order status. What is your order number?
returns: To initiate a return, please provide your order number.
You can return items within 30 days of purchase. Do you need help with a return?
What item would you like to return?
store_hours: Our store hours are from 9 AM to 9 PM, Monday to Sunday.
You can visit us from 9 AM to 9 PM every day.
We are open daily from 9 AM to 9 PM.
default: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you please rephrase?
Could you please provide more details?
I'm here to help! What else can I assist you with?
